page.title: 06Social Concerns Village Hall
page.content: The trustees of the Village Hall are the Parish council.It is managed by a Management Committee who supplement the income by fund raising activities. The income in 1984 from regular bookings of the Dancing School,Women's Institute,Good Companions,Play School, Girl Guides,Youth Club,Parish Council, Drama Group and Collingham Judo Club totalled Â£1363.25.From private functions eg.Wedding Receptions, Parties Â£263.25.Grants totalling Â£1737 were received from the Swinderby Poor Trust,District Council,Community Council and Parish Council.Fund raising activities organised by the Committee _ weekly tote,bingo,dances, fashion shows,gala,wine tasting raised Â£2961.46.Miscellaneous,eg.Village organisations and outside functions, Bank interest totalled Â£290.32. Expenses for the year totalled Â£5816.
